web_snippets: Joseph R. Gannascoli (born February 15, 1959) is an American actor. He is best known for his portrayal of Vito Spatafore on the HBO series The Sopranos.
Joseph R. Gannascoli (born February 15, 1959) is an American actor. He is best known for his portrayal of Vito Spatafore on the HBO series The Sopranos.
Joseph R. Gannascoli has appeared in many films. He is a gourmet chef. He learned the culinary arts and then opened a restaurant. In many interviews ...
